title: Make the Hero 'Start Your Project' CTA text white and bold

requirements.text: Update the landing page Hero primary CTA button label "Start Your Project" so its text renders in white (#FFFFFF) and bold, consistent with the rest of the header + Hero text styling.

quotes: make the start your project in white and bold too for landing page

acceptanceCriteria: On the landing page Hero section, the "Start Your Project" CTA text color is white (#FFFFFF) in its default state.
The "Start Your Project" CTA text remains bold.
The button remains readable and maintains sufficient contrast in hover/focus/active states without changing the button label text.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or any path listed in frontend.immutablePaths.
nonGoals: No changes to other sections' copy or layout beyond the "Start Your Project" CTA styling.
